name: Darkrise - Pixel Action RPG
describe: Darkrise is a classic hardcore game that was created by two indie developers in nostalgic pixel style. In this action RPG game you can get acquainted with 4 classes - Mage, Warrior, Archer and Rogue. Each of them has their own unique skills, game mechanics, features, strengths and weaknesses.Homeland of the game hero has been invaded by goblins, undead creatures, demons and neighboring countries. Now the hero has to become stronger and clean the country from invaders.There are 50 location to play on and 3 difficulties. Enemies will spawn in a front of you or appear from portals that will spawn randomly on location every few seconds. All enemies are different and have their unique features. Defective enemies can appear sometimes, they have random stats and you cannot predict their powers.Fighting system is quite juicy: camera shakes, strike flashes, health drop animation, dropped items fly in sides. Your character and enemies are fast, you always have to move if you don't want to lose.There are lots of possibilities to make your character stronger. There are 8 types and 6 rarities of equipment. You can make slots in your armor and place gems there, you can also combine several gems of one type to get an upgraded one. The smith in the town will gladly enchance and reforge your armor that will make it even better.

name: Vampire Survivors

You don‚Äôt want to be the last survivor with an empty pocket, do you? Within an instant, zombies had engulfed every corner of the world! Survivors formed various resistance groups to combat the zombies. In the spur of the moment, a mysterious girl in sailor uniform reappeared. What secrets lie behind her? What caused this sudden mutation? No time for questions, join the battle for the world!Unleash Your Power:‚Ä¢ Master the utilization of random skills that appear during the midst of battle.‚Ä¢ Collect disks of incredible power to release devastation upon the zombies.‚Ä¢ Arm yourself with a wide arsenal of weapons and gear, each with their own unique features and abilities.‚Ä¢ Take on daunting bosses and conquer new challenges in each level.‚Ä¢ Use the power of science to enhance your abilities and become even stronger.Join the fight and show these zombies what you're made of, and save the world in this heart-racing game!Join the Discord to see game news, give suggestions, report bugs, or contact the developers:https://discord.gg/M5uxkTemT3Join the Facebook for general game news:https://www.facebook.com/FattoySwordashGame Wiki by @mettlesomekettle:https://trello.com/b/MUX02UiT/swordash-origins

name: Combat Quest - Archer Hero RPG
describe: Combat Quest is a full-throttle roguelike RPG in an incredible fantasy setting. Go ahead, monster hunter: embark on an epic quest and explore the world of magic! But be careful! The adventures you face can be dangerous. Get ready for ferocious monsters, strong bosses, all kinds of weapons, archery, a quest in a mysterious dungeon and lots of magic.Hurricane-like gameplay: Bow masters, are you ready to raid? Become a combat master! This RPG will teach you shooting with a bow and arrow. An epic battle is waiting for you, dungeon hunter. Become a survivor and make your fame immortal, and the kingdom will thank you generously for your monster hunter skills! Bowmasters, all kinds of archery are waiting for you. It‚Äôs a life-and-death battle ahead! Defeat mighty monsters and get huge rewards. Every archer has unique skills for any gameplay style. In this action RPG, your battle royale experience depends on you alone!Are you a cunning dungeon hunter? An archer who knows soul magic? An archer born with a bow in their hand and destined to practice archery? Pick whoever you want to be the survivor. Deep upgrade system:Role-playing games are loved by millions of gamers. Combat Quest RPG isn‚Äôt just another shooting game. Bow masters, develop your unique style by leveling up and upgrading skills. Become a dungeon hunter and explore dungeons full of dangerous monsters. When adventure calls, you‚Äôll have to run, shoot arrows non-stop, and level up to earn immortal glory and the title of hero. Epic story:Not every online fantasy game can boast a cool plot. But a roguelike game like Combat Quest is an RPG survival game with an elaborate story full of adventure and action!Immortal evil has attacked the fairy kingdom! The monster is back and its magic is stronger than ever. A terrible battle was waged between bowmasters and monsters. Even the bravest archer hero couldn‚Äôt stop the dark lord and lost the battle royale. Now the bloodthirsty monsters of the dark wizard have left their dungeon and kidnapped the princess. Millions of monsters and piles of gold await in this arcade game. Can you survival and get all the rewards, or will the world of magic take your soul?Will you be a mysterious monster hunter? Or maybe a dashing Archer able to run fast and shoot a bow and arrow upgraded to Legendary status with phenomenal accuracy? Maybe you‚Äôre more of a combat master? Embark on a dangerous quest for survival. Grab your bow or a more powerful weapon, you‚Äôre in for a difficult battle royale. Get ready for an epic adventure with non-stop combat.Mobile role-playing games are an exciting experience. This shooting game online has everything you‚Äôre looking for: ‚óè Dungeon raid and archery. The perfect fun way to spend your time. You need to shoot accurately and wisely like real bow masters.‚óè Well-designed levels made with soul. You‚Äôll never get bored.‚óè Role model combat skills. Do you want to become a combat master?‚óè A huge global map waiting to be explored.‚óè Be a hero! Explore countless locations and endless dungeons.‚óè Different weapons, equipment, and non-stop shooting.‚óè The world of magic with high-quality 3D graphics.‚óè Monster, and not just one. This online role-playing shooter will make you sweat.Grab your bow and arrow and get ready. Archer, a raid in the dungeon is waiting for you! Many bowmasters have already tried their luck and skill. Maybe it‚Äôs you who will become the survivor?If you‚Äôre a fan of fantasy in a world of magic, then Combat Quest Roguelike RPG is here for you to be a hero!https://www.facebook.com/CombatQuestArchersupport mail: support@chillgaming.net

name: Cat Snack Bar: Cat Food Tycoon
describe: Dive into Cat Snack Bar, a delightful cat food game experience designed for fans of food games and cute cats! Begin your journey as an aspiring cat restaurant mogul at our enchanting diner, with adorable cats serving a variety of delectable dishes to animal patrons, setting you on a delightful and idle path to building a larger restaurant and achieving cat restaurant tycoon status!Indulge in an array of mouth-watering treats, from soups and coffee to pizzas, showcasing your culinary skills and progressing towards your restaurant tycoon dreams. Satisfy animal customers with your exquisite menu, earning tips with every delighted patron, and move closer to becoming a celebrated cat restaurant tycoon.Start with a cozy cat cafe and expand to a vibrant animal restaurant, demonstrating unrivaled managerial skills and a commitment to customer satisfaction at the Cat Snack Bar. Cat Snack Bar is essential for lovers of cats, cooking, and engaging gameplay. Embark on a journey to achieve your restaurant tycoon dreams with Cat Snack Bar!

name: Coin Master
describe: Join your Facebook friends and millions of players around the world in attacks, spins and raids to build your viking village to the top! Do you have what it takes to be the next Coin Master? Can you travel through time and magical lands to battle it out to be the best Pirate, Hippie, King, Warrior or VIKING of them of all!Spin to earn your lootSpin the wheel to fall on your fortune, be it attack time, loot, shields or raids. Become the Coin Master with the strongest village and the most loot!Attack and Raid fellow vikings!Earning coins through the slot machine isn't the only way to get loot, you can steal it too! Attack or raid friend and foe to save enough loot to build your village. No need to break the piggy bank! Fight back and come out victorious against your enemies. Boom! Take revenge on those who have attacked your village and take whats rightfully yours! Bring your Coin Dozer and get rich again! You never know what treasures you can find in someone else's village! Collect all the Cards!It's not always about the loot, it's about the treasure too! Collect cards to complete sets and move on to the next village. With every village you conquer your wins will be greaterPlay with friends!Trade your cards with our online community to collect them all! name: MapleStory R: Evolution-VN
describe: Countless creatures live in the beautiful continent of Maple World. People live and work in peace and contentment. However, one day, a huge black hole appeared in the sky, breaking the peace, and the connection between human beings and civilization disappeared. The survivors united to form an adventure alliance to save the broken world...   The officially authorized version of "MapleStory R: Evolution" is launched! Now idle your character to battle and win in a breeze!

name: Free Fire: Winterlands
describe: [Guild 2.0]Say hi to the revamped Guild system! Play matches with guildmates and earn Activity Points that can level up your guild and unlock awesome goodies at the Exchange Store. He forms a fire screen that obstructs view and causes burning damage instantly and over time to enemies who pass through.Free Fire is a world-famous survival shooter game available on mobile. Each 10-minute game places you on a remote island where you are pit against 49 other players, all seeking survival. Players freely choose their starting point with their parachute, and aim to stay in the safe zone for as long as possible. Manage your economy, purchase weapons, and defeat the enemy squad! Manage your economy, purchase weapons, and defeat the enemy squad![Realistic and smooth graphics]Easy to use controls and smooth graphics promises the optimum survival experience you will find on mobile to help you immortalize your name among the legends. describe: Plants Warfare is a Q-style fun casual game that Match 3 puzzle, Tower Defense, and Roguelike gameplay.One day, the peaceful life was disrupted by zombies attack. name: Supreme Duelist Stickman
describe: Supreme Duelist Stickman is a funny and crazy Stickman mobile game NEW Mini game mode:- play footbal with your friends on same device or VS CPUNEW Game Mode-Boss Fight Tournament-A lot of map (NEW MAP EDITOR)- With Simple control -Play and unlock new skin -1 player, 2 player, 3 player, 4 player with CPU and survival mode-Realistic stickman ragdoll-2d physic stick fight battle-create your own stickman wariorsDifferent modes-Gravity (ON/OFF)-Instant KO (if disable, the water, lava, etc will deal damages on contact) -Energy Shield (if disable, the stickman can bend down)You can choose your character and play with a friend in the 2 Player Mode.RHG stick fighting  game This game is totally free.casual game and fun stickfightThis is an addictive game!!!give me your feedback

name: My Talking Tom
describe: Talking Tom is the cat making every day a fun adventure.Players adopt this virtual pet, keep him happy and help him explore his world.- Talking Tom can really talk- Fashion and furniture items to collect- Mini games add action, adventure and fun- Travel destinations are waiting to be explored- Photo albums to be filled with memories- And moreFrom Outfit7, creators of My Talking Tom 2, My Talking Tom Friends, My Talking Angela 2 and My Talking Angela.This app contains:- Promotion of Outfit7's products and advertising;- Links that direct customers to Outfit7‚Äôs websites and other apps;- Personalization of content to encourage users to play the app again;- YouTube integration to allow users to watch videos of Outfit7's animated characters;- The option to make in-app purchases;- Subscriptions which automatically renew at the end of a subscription period unless cancelled. You can manage and cancel your subscription any time via Settings in your Google Play account;- Items to purchase (available in different prices) using virtual currency, depending on the player‚Äôs progress;- Alternative options to access all functionalities of the app without making any in-app purchases using real money.Terms of use: https://talkingtomandfriends.com/eula/en/EEA privacy policy: https://talkingtomandfriends.com/eea/en/US privacy policy: https://talkingtomandfriends.com/privacy/en/Brazil privacy policy: https://talkingtomandfriends.com/privacy-brazil/en/Rest of the world privacy policy: https://talkingtomandfriends.com/privacy/en/Customer support: support@outfit7.com

name: Phantom Blade: Executioners
describe: ''Phantom Blade'' is an action role-playing game in the dark martial arts style, created by S-GAME, exclusively released by NPH Gamota in the Vietnamese market. The game applies a high-speed combined action system, players delve into the aerial adventure called "Dark Land", fighting with fallen masters in "Reforming Killing Aura" of the martial arts world "Land of Darkness" and solve the darkest martial arts puzzles. [High-speed combat skill series]"Phantom Blade" has an extremely exciting high-speed combat system, players will play the role of "organizational" masters in a fierce carnage scene to fight against fallen heroes of the past.While retaining the true action experience, the game uses an innovative "skill chain" system to significantly lower the barrier to entry for players, allowing players to enjoy the ultimate combat fun. top. Players unleash unpredictable skill combinations with simplified one-touch operations, and the combination of different skills creates a variety of fighting styles. Everyone is their own martial arts master.[Martial style and Oriental architecture]The work shows a unique wanderer under a country ink painting, and exploits corresponding rendering technology to express this style. With the support of leading animation studios, sophisticated and professional martial arts animations are used as the main medium of expression, restoring a cold and cruel mysterious martial art‚Äîthe series " Phantom Blade" hopes to define a unique combination of Eastern martial arts, science fiction and dark fantasy elements. We call it "Martial Arts Style".Michael CTY - Art director of Fromsoftware "Dark Souls 1/2" and "Demon's Souls", acts as art director of this work. [Strange and mysterious wanderer story]Tang Mon's massacre, Nga Mi's tragedy, Hong Diep's demonic talk, Trai Tinh sword's destruction... Murderous intent is rampant, strange faces are roaming, and the forces behind are becoming more and more unpredictable, players need to delve into strange dark adventures, fight against fallen masters one by one in "Enhance Killing Intent" and continue to develop until the real enemy is found.The work uses the method of presenting the plot in the form of images of character classes. In addition to the main events of the plot, a large number of random side events and difficult challenges will also explain the story. the vastness and mystery of the martial arts world in the "Land of Darkness".

name: Paper.io 2
describe: Welcome to Paper.io 2, the ultimate conquest game from Voodoo! Conquer as much territory as possible and beat the competition with a smooth drawing experience!Are you ready to become the champion of township and take over the game? With Paper.io 2, you can draw your way to victory and claim your space before your opponents beat you to it.Our game offers exciting and challenging gameplay that will keep you engaged for hours. With each level, you'll face new obstacles and enemies, but don't worry - with your strategic skills, you'll be able to overcome them all.But that's not all - with our addictive gameplay and user-friendly interface, you'll keep coming back for more. Our game is perfect for players of all ages, and with the option to play online or offline, you can enjoy it anytime, anywhere.So, what are you waiting for? Download Paper.io 2 now and start your conquest today! Our game offers the ultimate gaming experience and will keep you hooked for hours on end. Don't miss out on this opportunity to become the champion!

name: Super Slime - Black Hole Game
describe: Let's devour everything in sight and be the super slime in this world!As an invader of Earth, your goal is to EAT THE WORLD. As a super slime, everything is your prey. You start as a small, cute slime, eating barely visible things, but someone needs to be cautious. You can grow rapidly and destroy an entire city in seconds!Super Slime is a black hole game that  can swallow everything near you! Your mouth is a black hole that swallows everything smaller than you. To eat larger things, move around smoothly like a snake and devour more and more.From seeds and fruits‚Ä¶to fences, humans, trees, houses, markets, buildings, or even entire cities. Wherever you are, you are the predator of this world, and everything around you is your prey. Test the limits of how much you can swallow before time runs out.In the end, you will have to fight against a giant monster enemy using what you have swallowed in this black hole game. Can you become big enough to battle it? Can you be the real Super Slime?Don't forget your mission on this devouring journey! Find the target and swallow it within the limited time. It will make this eating game more exciting and intense!Play with No WiFi! You can also play this game for free with no internet service! This offline game is perfect for killing time during a long car ride.This addictive game capture you with its simple play and the satisfaction of destroying everything by devouring.Through "Super Slime - Black Hole Game", become a cute invader villain and crush every city you land!
